snippet: Mr. Granger, who was once a Chicago newspaperman, also wrote more than a score of mysteries and spy thrillers, many of which evoked the rougher environs of Chicago.
abstract: Bill Granger, journalist turned novelist, dies at age 70.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Granger, who was once a Chicago newspaperman, also wrote more than a score of mysteries and spy thrillers, many of which evoked the rougher environs of Chicago.

headline.seo: Bill Granger, Novelist and Reporter, Dies at 70
headline.main: Bill Granger, Journalist Turned Author of Fiction, Dies at 70
headline.print_headline: Bill Granger, 70, Journalist Turned Author of Fiction
